extendedInfo.description: Have fun creating photos like never before!â¨â¨Dubblen is a unique use of your camera. DID YOU CLONE YOURSELF? DO YOU HAVE A TWIN NOW? You can now create two pictures in one by using Dubblenâs split camera lens. Shake your own hand, run from yourself, create an alter ego, play basketball against yourself, and millions of other possibilities. So grab a friend and start having some photo fun, and be sure to share your cool, creative photos through all of your social networks so that you can make your other friends jealous.â¨â¨If youâve been searching for that cool Android app, look no farther. Youâve found it!â¨â¨That's right, you can now clone yourself! You can now create the twin that you never had. Your twin/clone can now be just as cool as you.â¨â¨HOW IT WORKS (CAMERA):â¨1. The camera is vertically split down the middle. â¨2. You take your first photo on the left side of the screenâ¨3. After snapping the first photo on the left side of the screen, the right side of the screen now becomes active. You can now snap the photo using the right side of the camera. â¨4. Once you have taken both sides, click on the Merger tab to merge the left and right side. You now have what looks like two pictures, saved as one picture!â¨â¨If you donât like the picture you have taken, just hit the âStart Overâ button in the top left corner and create another masterpiece. So if donât get it the first time, the second time may be perfect!â¨â¨HOW IT WORKS (LIBRARY):â¨1. Click on the Library tab.â¨2. Choose a photo from your phoneâs photo library. â¨3. After choosing your photo(s), you can click on the Settings option (the center icon) to do Picture Effects and change your Photo Filters. In addition to changing Filters, you can also Enhance your photo (auto, night, backlit, balance); change the Orientation of the image (rotate or flip); Crop; Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, Sharpness, Draw, and Redeye.â¨4. Save & Share!â¨â¨Upgrade to Dubblen+ and now have access to over 2 different cool double frames for your pictures and also a horizontally split camera in addition to your vertically split camera.SAVE & SHAREâ¨â You can save your images to the [Dubblen] App Library and/or your SD Card.â Simply share your photos through Twitter, Facebook, Tumblr, Flickr, or Instagram. Sign in one time and with one click, you can share through the social network of your choice.â¨â You can email or text your friends and family and inform them about the Dubblen app or show them your photos taken with the Dubblen appâ¨â¨FEATURESâ¨â Saved share settings â no need in logging into your social networking account every time you want to share a photo. â¨â Vertically split screen â the split with rotate based on how your are holding your camera (up/down or sideways) â¨â Using the lightning bold icon, turn the manually turn the flash On, Off, or leave it on Auto (default option)â¨â Using the light bulb icon, you can keep your photo its original color or you can make your photo Black & Whiteâ¨â Take unlimited photosâ¨â Front & back camera supportâ¨ - please note that when taking a photo with the front camera, the resulted photo is flipped. Please note this when taking a photo with the front camera.â¨â¨SPECIAL NOTES & SUGGESTIONSâ¨â If you do not have a very steady hand, we suggest taking photos with backgrounds that you do not have to line a lot of things. The update to our merging feature for your photos should make this task easier. â¨â HAVE FUN!!Follow us on Twitter @DubblenApp and like us on Facebook.

reviews.title: Good idea
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t save the pic!!!! Wth man. I had awesome pictures with my son posing and NONE saved!!! Please fix. gs3
reviews.author: che gaiter

reviews.title: Could be great w/ improvements
reviews.comment: Add a timer so one person can take their own pictures without help. Also, front camera does not work as well as I would hope. Fix and this app would be wonderful.
reviews.author: Maddie Freeman

reviews.title: Needs Work
reviews.comment: I even save or share my pics! & The front camera sucks. Horrible. Needs a lot more work.
reviews.author: Jahlisa Goodwin

reviews.title: Need Fixing!!!
reviews.comment: I take the pic but out never saves. Please fix! Thanks.
reviews.author: tia hill

reviews.title: Greatest App ever
reviews.comment: Supper fun. Once you get the hang of it and for the dummies that rated it low...if you using the front cam you have to use the opposite box dummy. Once you get the hang of it it looks too good. Wish I could post pic. It will make you say WOW.
reviews.author: Milton Carrell

reviews.title: abc
reviews.comment: first taking photos ,it success. but when i try it more ,the camera didn\'t take the photos and then it suddenly forced close .. very dissatisfied .. and if there is a timer, it\'ll be better :)
reviews.author: Shunny Sunny

reviews.title: Potential to be a great app
reviews.comment: The app is good just keep working out the kinks and continue to work on it.  It took a few minutes to figure it out but other then that fun app. Keep making it better.
reviews.author: Larry Howard

reviews.title: Worst app ever
reviews.comment: 1. the camera quality is not good.  2. The photos can\'t be saved!  3. Nothing is saved in my album!  GO AND FIXED IT PLEASE
reviews.author: Naddy yaya

reviews.title: THIS IS BOGUS
reviews.comment: I Can\'t save my pictures so what\'s the point of taking them !?
reviews.author: Tierra Higgins

reviews.title: Blurry!!
reviews.comment: Every time I take the picture, it comes out blurry. My camera works perfectly fine with out the app. Plus this does need a time for at least 5 seconds!!
reviews.author: tikerria james

reviews.title: Sweeet
reviews.comment: The only thing that could make this app better is if you could save the picture for later. Like taking a picture of a tree in the spring and going back and getting the other half of the tree in winter like a progression picture.
reviews.author: Chelsea Hartshorn

reviews.title: Needs some adjustments
reviews.comment: It works great but will not let you save & share the photo once you get that fixed then it\'ll work fine so until then I will be uninstalling it!
reviews.author: Kimberly Williams

reviews.title: Does Not Work!!!!!
reviews.comment: Most terrible app. I do not see how it recieved the stars it has. Will not save pics!!! And ads pop up before you can save pics with no option to go back to the pic that you were trying to save. Lost my perfected photo because of this. Uninstalling....
reviews.author: LaKeisha Madlock

reviews.title: NEEDS A TIMER!!!!
reviews.comment: Need a timer. It would be a 3 star if it had a timer. Fix the camera. When i take the pics the first one looks faded. You guys need to get it yourself and see how crappy it is. FIX IT or imma uninstall it!!!!
reviews.author: Abey Gord

reviews.title: pretty good .
reviews.comment: nice app \' works just like split cam . < which i\'ve been wanting for the longest \' i would rate aa 5 but theres a problem when i try to save !
reviews.author: Breeana Woodson

reviews.title: Needs fixing
reviews.comment: Nice app but it won\'t let me share my pictures. They only save on the app not in my gallery as well please fix it
reviews.author: gabriel williams

reviews.title: Good but.....
reviews.comment: Its good but the image is a bit blurred and it wont even let me save
reviews.author: miszmacrita larustia

reviews.title: Not good.
reviews.comment: The pictures are faded and it\'s a little confusing when you take the photo.
reviews.author: phylencia latney

reviews.title: Keeps freezing.
reviews.comment: Its an ok app. But the fact after a couple of shots it just freezes and closes down it self. YOU REALLY HAVE TO FIX THIS.K? (Sony Xperia J)
reviews.author: sadiya malik

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 2 Cant save images
reviews.comment: Really nice concept as far as shooting the pics, looks neat, but once I merge the images I cant save them. Set up some really cool shots but couldnt save them.
reviews.author: everett moorefield
